item.name: Shaved Mango Supreme
item.descirption: Super finely shaved mango juice (not pure ice!) topped with fresh and juicy mango cubes, mango sauce and vanilla ice cream, smothered with real condensed milk (not condensed creamer!). Additional add-ons are extra.
